QuestData.Title: Rats, Tinky Went into the Necropolis!
QuestData.Description: I told Tinky not to go off on her own, but she just HAD to check out that crashed necropolis to the west.$B$BI'm 100% certain that those cultists came from inside that thing, which means I'm now 100% certain that Tinky's in trouble!$B$BShe's the airstrip's number one engineer. Without her we're doomed!$B$BI'd find her myself, but one of those things got in a swipe on my leg before I could vanish again. $n, if anyone can get her out, it's you!
QuestData.RewardText: Hey there! Who are you?$B$BBixie sent you? Excellent, let's get me out of here!
